about.content:
🗺️ This is a map of nearby changing tables.

🧑‍🧑‍🧒 As parents ourselves, we know how important it is to have access to a clean and safe place to change your baby. We hope this map will help you find the nearest changing table when you need it.

🌍 All the data it contains comes from the community. You can help us by adding new changing tables or by updating the information of existing ones on OpenStreetMap.
about.title: About
